details.title: Application of Electronic Data Processing Airport Analysis in Airlines Operations and for Manufacturers
details.abstract: An analysis of the factors affecting aircraft takeoff and landing weights is presented. This analysis, made with the aid of a computer, considers all factors, including: type of aircraft; weight; temperature; wind; engines; payload; policies; limits; runway slope, conditions, and length; obstructions; and aircraft flap settings.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
